total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 3s in the input grid.
Q2: Replace the identified cells with 3s in the output grid.
Q3: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 8s in the input grid.
Q4: Replace the identified cells with 8s in the output grid.
Q5: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 2s in the input grid.
Q6: Replace the identified cells with 2s in the output grid.
Q7: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 1s in the input grid.
Q8: Replace the identified cells with 1s in the output grid.
Q9: For the remaining cells, copy the values from the input grid to the output grid.
